question_sentence: A new vaccine became available this week for which virus?
evidence: A new Covid-19 vaccine is available — and recommended — for everyone ages 6 months and older, and experts say it’s best to take advantage of the protection it provides sooner rather than later.

question_sentence: Which political leader met with North Korea’s Kim Jong Un this week?
evidence: The leaders of Russia and North Korea met this week after US officials warned that the two countries are “actively advancing” in a potential arms deal.

question_sentence: The convicted murderer who escaped from a Pennsylvania prison was captured Wednesday. How many days was he able to evade law enforcement?
evidence: Danilo Cavalcante was able to hide for 13 days until police found him in the woods of South Coventry Township, lying on top of a rifle he had stolen from a nearby resident days earlier. A police dog named Yoda was released on him, biting him and preventing him from using the rifle before police took him into custody.

question_sentence: Astronomers announced they found a planet around 120 light-years away from Earth that might have all the elements needed to sustain life. What is the planet’s name?
evidence: NASA said exoplanet K2-18b may have some key features of a planet that could support bodies of water — and life.

question_sentence: Which North African country was inundated with catastrophic flooding this week?
evidence: More than 5,000 people have died in eastern Libya this week due to flash flooding, according to government and hospital officials. Around 10,000 others are believed to be missing.

question_sentence: Apple on Tuesday unveiled its iPhone 15 lineup. Which current iPhone feature will be significantly altered in the new version?
evidence: Apple retired its Lightning charger on Tuesday, exactly 11 years to the day from when it was first announced, marking a milestone for the company by adopting universal charging.

question_sentence: Which is the biggest national park in North America?
evidence: Northeast Greenland National Park is currently the globe’s single largest national park and biggest land-based protected area in North America. It is around 375,000 square miles, making it larger than most countries.

question_sentence: Which GOP lawmaker called for a formal impeachment inquiry into President Joe Biden?
evidence: McCarthy has called for a formal impeachment inquiry into Biden amid pressure from conservatives, even as they have yet to prove allegations he directly profited off his son’s foreign business deals.

question_sentence: Quarterback Aaron Rodgers suffered a season-ending injury this week, devastating many football fans. Which NFL team is he currently a part of?
evidence: While making his debut with the New York Jets, Rodgers was carted off the field after suffering a left Achilles injury on just his fourth play in the team’s Monday Night Football game against the Buffalo Bills.

question_sentence: Which 90s pop group reunited on stage for the first time in over a decade at the MTV Video Music Awards?
evidence: All five members of the iconic boy band *NSYNC reunited on stage for the first time since 2013. See the moment here.

question_sentence: What is the reason behind McDonald's decision to remove self-serve soda machines from U.S. locations by 2032?
choices: To reduce soda consumption among customers.
To make the experience more consistent for customers and employees.
To cut costs and increase profits.
To combat the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on their business.

question_sentence: What is the significance of the Baby Blue bobblehead being released by the University of Delaware?
choices: It celebrates National Bobblehead Day on Jan. 7
It commemorates the founding of the National Bobblehead Hall of Fame and Museum.
It honors Col. George W. YoUDee's bravery in battle during the Revolutionary War.

question_sentence: What are the symptoms of West Nile fever?
choices: Swollen lymph nodes, muscle weakness, and convulsions
Stiff neck, tremors, and rashes on the chest
High temperature, head and body aches, swollen lymph nodes, and rashes on the back or chest

question_sentence: When did Phish first perform in Delaware?
What was the final score of the football game between Delaware and Penn State?
What is the title of the new movie that Teri Polo starred in, which was filmed in Delaware?
In the first half of 2023, Delaware saw a significant increase in legal abortions compared to 2020. What percentage increase did Delaware experience during this period?
Why did the Christina School District decide to move its graduation ceremonies from the University of Delaware?
choices: The University of Delaware increased its rental fees for the venue.
The University of Delaware refused to host the school district's graduations.
The Christina School District wanted to consolidate graduations into a single day.
The University of Delaware security staff is accused of mishandling a recent graduation event.

question_sentence: Who was the last former walk-on to become a Delaware football captain before Ethan Saunders in 2023?
